turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I was looking to order some coffee from the Fort Gratiot Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a black and white mocha with extra whipped cream, a grande size with 2% milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering a grande black and white mocha with 2% and extra whipped cream to be picked up at the starbucks in fort gratiot, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, your drink will be ready in 5 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nope, that'll be it for me. Thank you.
